audioText: Ce homme riche possède une collection immense d'art contemporain et de livres rares.
question: What does the rich man possess?
options: An immense collection of contemporary art and rare books
A small collection of modern paintings
A large collection of antique furniture
An impressive collection of musical instruments
explanation: The text states 'Ce homme riche possède une collection immense d'art contemporain et de livres rares' - This rich man possesses an immense collection of contemporary art and rare books. The adjectives 'riche' (rich) and 'immense' (immense/huge) describe wealth and scale.
